review: This is a really good streaming stick. It has a really aesthetically pleasing set up and runs smoothly for the most part. There are glitches sometimes when running Netflix, but nothing major. I like the fact that it has a remote and you can use your smart phone to type in searches and control content as well. I wish it had more apps (like Vudu), but overall it is excellent for the price I paid.
author: Greg Williams
